short_summary: BPM020519 - APC Battery Modules for SSC

full_summary:
****Government Tender Announcement****
=====================================

### Request for Proposal: APC Battery Modules for Shared Services Canada

#### Reference Number: SSC-24-00025123:T
#### Solicitation Number: BPM020519/25123
#### Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-22T14:00:00
#### Evaluation Type: Competitive - Open Bidding

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites proposals from qualified suppliers to provide APC battery modules containing 4 battery units, or equivalent, to replace APC batteries on a UPS system. The modules must be compatible with APC Symmetra PX 20/40/80, Smart-UPS VT, and Galaxy 3500 UPSs. Delivery is required to a location in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Mandatory Requirements:

* Suppliers must provide pricing in accordance with Annex A - List of Deliverables and Pricing.
* Bid submissions must respect all requirements of the bid solicitation.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Mandatory criteria:
	+ Compatibility with APC Symmetra PX 20/40/80, Smart-UPS VT, and Galaxy 3500 UPSs.
	+ Pricing in accordance with Annex A - List of Deliverables and Pricing.
* Evaluation criteria and basis of selection are outlined in the Request for Quotations document.

#### Important Notice

* Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email.
* Faxed and hard copy (submitted in person or via mail/courier) bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

#### Language of Bid Submissions

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Reyna Teresa Garcia Tito, 343-552-0578.
* SSC Office: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1.

#### Attachments

* Request for Quotations document and documentation related to this requirement are available on the SSC website at [SSCP2PSPC.SSC-SPC.GC.CA](http://SSCP2PSPC.SSC-SPC.GC.CA).

**Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.** ****
===================================================== ****
